en.title: How do you want to proceed?
en.fact: The court needs to be sure that adultery took place for it to be used as the reason for divorce (legally known as the 'fact')
en.options: As your {{ case.divorceWho }} hasn't admitted the adultery, you now need to choose from the following options:
en.onlyDoThis: You should only do this if you can prove the adultery took place. If you haven't already sent the court evidence of the adultery, you'll be able to upload more later in this application.
en.evidence: Evidence can include messages (eg letters, text messages, emails), photos, or an admission of the adultery from the person your {{ case.divorceWho }} committed adultery with.
